name: Cold Fox Run
description:
Cold Fox Run is an endless runner where you play as a fox running away from a forever chasing snowball. Jump and slow down to dodge obstacles! Go as fast as possible with power ups from sparkly bushes! Get upgrades to go faster, and get higher scores! Equip cool skins and hats to look beautiful!

Try to get as far as you can and have fun! :)

You can play the tuturial by pressing the smallest blue button with a graduation hat.
